name: Come In, Over - Demo
description: "Come In, Over" is a puzzle, strategy game with "Paper's Please" as the main inspiration. You are a Radio Operator, working for your Government, The People's Electorate of Prosovko, of which is currently enduring a threatening revolt of its regime. Both parties are undesirable and Your interests lie with the citizens of Prosovko. In war casualties are inevitable, however you can limit it.
